title: Installation issue: gcc@8.4.0 languages=ada,c,c++,fortran due to unawareness of gnat
body:
I failed to build ` gcc@8.4.0 languages=ada,c,c++,fortran` even with `gnat` ada compiler installed.

### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-498-b8073dc
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gcc@8.4.0 languages=c,c++,fortran,ada %gcc@4.8.5 target=x86_64
...
==> Ran patch() for gcc
==> 27090: gcc: Building gcc [AutotoolsPackage]
==> 27090: gcc: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> 27090: gcc: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/tmp/hpc-jianwen/spack-stage-gcc-8.4.0-dexlfuytj7bbuic3dru6q6auvfbkgozb/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/lustre
/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/opt/cascadelake/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-8.4.0-dexlfuytj7bbuic3dru6q6auvfbkgoz
b' '--with-pkgversion=Spack GCC' '--with-bugurl=https://github.com/spack/spack/issues' '--disable-multilib' '--enab
le-languages=ada,c,c++,fortran' '--disable-nls' '--with-mpfr=/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/opt/cascadelake/linu
x-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/mpfr-3.1.6-kflyoj7nrj2mht5pf4z7mtkdp4hcbs5v' '--with-gmp=/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianw
en/opt/cascadelake/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gmp-6.1.2-6bsovvkqwx6zscwtbvjj6egrgizbyycm' '--with-system-zlib'
'--with-mpc=/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/opt/cascadelake/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/mpc-1.1.0-v5rqsbkr3zbi
a475v33ndowqhecvcvzn' '--with-isl=/lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/opt/cascadelake/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/
isl-0.18-l4somr6goh77xpmdb4tey7uwovhds526'

1 error found in build log:
     34    checking for objdir... .libs
     35    checking for the correct version of gmp.h... yes
     36    checking for the correct version of mpfr.h... yes
     37    checking for the correct version of mpc.h... yes
     38    checking for the correct version of the gmp/mpfr/mpc libraries... yes
     39    checking for isl 0.15 or later... yes
  >> 40    configure: error: GNAT is required to build ada
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux 3.10.0-862.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Apr 20 16:44:24 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
```
